name: Math Mountain
description:
Get Revived with MATH TRIVIA while going down the steep Mountain. Avoid deadly traps including Trees, Spikes, Bombs and Ice. Try it for free.

Math Mountain was designed to help you increase your Math knowledge while having fun. It includes many Math Subjects and Topics. Keep track of your knowledge by checking the Statistics which saves the number of correct answers out of the total answers.

At the beginning of each game, choose the subject you are interested in. You can select Grade 1, Grade 2, Grade 3, Grade 4, Grade 5, and Grade 6. Then choose the topic related to the chosen subject. For example G1_General_Math subject include G1_ Add_Five. Here is a list of all the subject and their corresponding topics:.

Grade1_General_Math: G1_ Add_Five G1_General_Math; G1_ Highest_Number; G1_ Lowest_Number; G1_ Substraction_Related_Fact;G1_ Take_Away_Five; G1_Addition ; G1_Addition_Related_Fact; G1_Coins; G1_Count_by_10; G1_Sequence ; G1_Substraction; G1_Take_Away_10.

Grade2_General_Math: G2_Adding_by_10_and_100; G2_Addition; G2_Coins; G2_Highest; G2_Least_Amount; G2_Simple_Addition; G2_Simple_Substraction; G2_Simplified_Multiplication; G2_Substraction; G2_Take_Away_10_and_100

MultiverseGames Inc combines fun and knowledge into one application. We include Knowledge Modules in our Arcade apps. We call it Tricade. In our games, once your character dies, a Knowledge based question will pop up. The progress of the game will be decided by your feedback. Needless to say that if your answer is right, you will move on in the game; however, if your answer is wrong, you will have to restart from the beginning.
